details: This remedy is akin to the ordinary Chamomilla. Gastric disturbances with coldness. Sensitive to cold air and cold things.Respiration.Coryza with much lachrymation, sneezing, and discharge of clear water from the nose. Symptoms worse indoors. Constriction and rawness of throat. Cough, tickling; worse in warm room.

Abdomen: Aching in region of liver; griping and CHILLINESS INSIDE OF ABDOMEN and into legs
Itching of anus, with white putty-like stools
Pain along spermatic cord, which feels full, as if varicosed
Skin: Itching of the soles, as if from chilblains

name: Anthemis nobilis
